channel.title: BlazeX < THE CLOSEST THING TO NEAR REALITY >
channel.description:
BlazeX
BlazeX is by far the closest thing to Near Reality, it has most if not all near reality customs/
Features This server has many different features such as; Dicing Nex Armours with working Torva Hp, Virtus Hp and Pernix Hp! Lime Whip Death Cape Lava Whip Bronze-Dragon Whip Barrows Whip Gold H'ween Mask White H'ween Mask Pink Party Hat Black Party Hat Sky Party Hat Lava Party Hat Tokhaar-Kal (New fire cape) Completionist Cape Veteren Cape (All capes this style) Fully recoded minigames Source fully recoded Donation Shop Pkp Shop Dungeoneering Armours All bosses! Duel Arena Pest Control Barrows Warriors Guild Tzhaar Cave (With Jad) In-game Highscore board! Vote Shop All PVP items. Chaotics BlazeX Shop All working skills Working TB All spells work Daily server events Active Forums Active Webclient Amazing professional dedicated staff! Hiring! Fully licensed vBulletin Forum
Features soon to be added: Titles Prestiges
[U][URL=http://"http://www.blazex.net/forums/forum.php"]Forums[/URL][/U]
[U][URL=http://"http://www.blazex.net/forums/forumdisplay.php?5-Webclient"]Webclient[/URL][/U]
[U][URL=http://"http://www.blazex.net/forums/forumdisplay.php?6-Download-Client"]Download Client[/URL][/U]

item.title: BlazeX < THE CLOSEST THING TO NEAR REALITY >
item.dc:creator: @BrandonHarkness BrandonHarkness
item.description:
@BrandonHarkness wrote:

dizaster798:

Server Looks Epic! Just lost over 60b+ on Near Reality going to start playing this

I have no idea how you managed that, as Near-Reality shut down in January.

OT: Isn’t the closest server to Near-Reality, only some NPCs and customs, nonetheless good luck.

Read full topic
item.source: BlazeX < THE CLOSEST THING TO NEAR REALITY >
